name: Monitor Android phone
short_description:
TheTruthSpy is the most powerful cell phone spy and tracking software that lets you monitor ALL the activities of iPhone and Android phone. 
The application is super easy to install on the phone you want to monitor.

Example of uses
- 
Catch cheating spouses
- Back up phone data – Track stolen or lost phone
- 
Monitor your employees – Tracking transport employee, vehicles
- Protect your children with TheTruthSpy

summary: cell phone spy and tracking software
